values: Hot shit damn, this account is too old.

Science=91

Penmanship=B ..Why do I get graded for this? O_o;

Average=85.1..I just missed the honor roll. >:O
Conduct=A XD! What the heck? O-o;
I was absent 6 times...lol.

That concludes my report card

I don't really like posting on this much. Well, We had this "Religious Retreat" thing for our school o_o;; (I go to a catholic school T_T) It was boring.Whatever.
So ,we went back to school and the freaking substitute teacher of my homeroom kept harrassing me-big time! like yelling at me for no reason, and getting pissy because I didn't let him see my "song" sheet to the music from the church. I was sharing with a few other people, and he was being a loser about it. He also bumped into me several times and while I was writing he was screaming, "WHAT'RE YOU WRITING?" ..I replied:: "What I am suppose to do. Write the composition YOU just ASSIGNED a FEW minutes AGO."
I stared at my paper, writing rather quickly in blue ink.
He then pushed my hand, and the pen moved across the paper..totally messing up my final copy.>__>
Then he took out a knife and was destroying a frickin' calender. O_o;
I told him "KNIVES AREN'T ALLOWED IN SCHOOL" I shouted, making a scene.
he snickered, "That rule applies to the students only." He shoved it back into his pocket, before anyone saw.
Then he said,"It was a tweezer."


O_o;?

This journal is for me to post in and my friends to read and comment. Make a comment here if you want to have access to this Journal..It depends who you are..like if you have similar intrests i might add you..
